About

Hi there, I am Rui Wang; a software engineer from Cambridge UK. Currently, providing enterprise solutions to biotech industry, a keen contributor to open-source projects.

I am open to interesting and fun consulting gigs, short-term contracts. If you think you have somthing we can work together on then get in touch.

I am also on Twitter and LinkedIn.
